attributes.action: Provide free prescriptions for asthmatics,  unrelated to income; and time off work to attend check-ups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Asthmatics will die without their medication and therefore should not have to bear the burden of paying prescription charges to stay alive. ALL the medication prescribed for them should be available to them free of charge, irrelant to income. They should not have to use annual leave to go to their GP for asthma medication reviews and asthma nurse checks.
